div.div:
公开state：
双方血量、道具
轮次、回合、是否当前回合的操作者
上次使用道具信息(或空)：使用者、道具类型、使用结果
隐藏state：
枪中子弹数量与类型

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 221px; margin-left: 556px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); white-space: nowrap;

div.span:
服务端：三张道具
客户端：要哪几张 or 跳过
服务端：state

switch.text: 抽牌阶段服务端：三张道具客户端：要哪几张 or 跳过...

span.data-font-family: "Open Sans", "Clear Sans", "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, Arial, "Segoe UI Emoji", sans-serif
span.style: font-size: 12px; font-family: "Times New Roman"; font-weight: normal; font-style: normal; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0pt; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: 折叠刀：使下一次开枪的伤害翻倍

span.data-font-family: "Open Sans", "Clear Sans", "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, Arial, "Segoe UI Emoji", sans-serif
span.style: font-size: 12px; font-family: "Times New Roman"; font-weight: normal; font-style: normal; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0pt; vertical-align: baseline;

span.style: font-size: 12px; font-family: "Times New Roman"; font-weight: normal; font-style: normal; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0pt; vertical-align: baseline;

span.data-font-family: "Open Sans", "Clear Sans", "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, Arial, "Segoe UI Emoji", sans-serif
span.style: font-size: 12px; font-family: "Times New Roman"; font-weight: normal; font-style: normal; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0pt; vertical-align: baseline;

span.style: font-size: 12px; font-family: "Times New Roman"; font-style: normal; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0pt; vertical-align: baseline;

span.data-font-family: "Open Sans", "Clear Sans", "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, Arial, "Segoe UI Emoji", sans-serif
span.style: font-size: 12px; font-family: "Times New Roman"; font-weight: normal; font-style: normal; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0pt; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: 手铐：对手下一回合无法行动

span.data-font-family: "Open Sans", "Clear Sans", "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, Arial, "Segoe UI Emoji", sans-serif
span.style: font-size: 12px; font-family: "Times New Roman"; font-weight: normal; font-style: normal; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0pt; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: 放大镜：是查看当前枪膛内子弹是空包弹还是实弹

span.style: color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: "Times New Roman"; font-size: 12px; background-color: initial;

span.data-font-family: "Open Sans", "Clear Sans", "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, Arial, "Segoe UI Emoji", sans-serif
span.style: font-size: 12px; font-family: "Times New Roman"; font-weight: normal; font-style: normal; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0pt; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: 逆转器：修改当前枪膛内子弹的类型，若为空包弹，则修改为实弹；若为实弹，则修改为空包弹

span.data-font-family: "Open Sans", "Clear Sans", "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, Arial, "Segoe UI Emoji", sans-serif
span.style: font-size: 12px; font-family: "Times New Roman"; font-weight: normal; font-style: normal; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0pt; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: 电话：若枪内仍有x颗子弹，查看第2颗到第x颗中随机一颗的子弹类型

span.style: color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: "Times New Roman"; font-size: 12px; background-color: initial;

span.data-font-family: "Open Sans", "Clear Sans", "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, Arial, "Segoe UI Emoji", sans-serif
span.style: font-size: 12px; font-family: "Times New Roman"; font-weight: normal; font-style: normal; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); letter-spacing: 0pt; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: 药盒：服用后，有50%概率回复玩家2点血量，50%概率扣除玩家1点血量

switch.text: 折叠刀：使下一次开枪的伤害翻倍香烟：回复玩家1点血量...
